17.title: Uniform Antidiscrimination Act
17.description: Prohibit The Discrimination Against A Person Or Segregation From A Place Of Public Accommodation On The Basis Of Sex Or Sexual Orientation.

572.title: Workplace Freedom Act
572.description: Also Prohibit Such Discrimination Because Of Sexual Orientation Or Gender Identity And To Define "sexual Orientation" And "gender Identity".

2587.title: Murder
2587.description: Relating To Statutory Aggravating Circumstances Applicable To The Punishment For Murder, To Add As A Statutory Aggravating Circumstance Cases In Which The Murder Was Committed Against A Person Because Of The Person's Actual Or Perceived Race, Color, Religion, National Origin, Gender, Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, Or Disability.
